channel.title: AI on Zigzaggery
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Zigzaggery

item.title: Anthropomorphism and its Discontents
item.description: Introduction AI technologies raise many ethical questions. Some of these are associated with technical underpinnings and operation; surveillance, data gathering, and analysis, or copyright and intellectual property issues as can be seen in the widescale processing of published writing or artworks that support generative AI.
